Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, just north of the Grape Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The Richland Grape Orchard, owned by the Iilandi Family, grows the finest and tastiest grapes in all the lands. The grapes are harvested and fermented into the finest wines, distributed throughout Oceancrest and often exported in exchange for other needed goods. The Richland Bordeaux wines often command quite a price.
